layout.title: Payment Plans
layout.message: Displays a list of payment plans

param.name: usage
param.label: Plan ID
param.description: Enter a payment plan ID that you want to link to directly, if any.

param.name: group
param.label: Group ID
param.description: Enter a payment plan group ID that you want to link to directly, if any.

param.name: processor
param.label: Payment Processor
param.description: Specify a payment processor by its short handle (ie. 'paypal_subscription' for PayPal Subscription).

param.name: intro
param.label: Intro
param.description: If you have set an Intro Page in your AEC Settings, you can skip it with this setting. Intro Pages do not apply if you have already specified a plan or group id.
